# serval_app_resource_roles (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "serval_app_resource_roles" "example_app_resource_roles" {
  app_instance_id = "appInstanceId"
  resource_id = "resourceId"
  team_id = "teamId"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `app_instance_id` (String) Filter by app instance ID. At least one of team_id, app_instance_id, or resource_id must be provided.
- `max_items` (Number) Max items to fetch, default: 1000
- `resource_id` (String) Filter by resource ID. At least one of team_id, app_instance_id, or resource_id must be provided.
- `team_id` (String) Filter by team ID. At least one of team_id, app_instance_id, or resource_id must be provided.

### Read-Only

- `items` (Attributes List) The items returned by the data source (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items))

<a id="nestedatt--items"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items`

Read-Only:

- `access_policy_id` (String) The default access policy for the role.
- `description` (String) A description of the role.
- `external_data` (String) Data from the external system as a JSON string (computed by server).
- `external_id` (String) The external ID of the role in the external system (optional).
- `id` (String) The ID of the role.
- `name` (String) The name of the role.
- `provisioning_method` (Attributes) Provisioning configuration. **Exactly one method should be set.** (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items--provisioning_method))
- `requests_enabled` (Boolean) Whether requests are enabled for the role.
- `resource_id` (String) The ID of the resource that the role belongs to.

<a id="nestedatt--items--provisioning_method"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items.provisioning_method`

Read-Only:

- `builtin_workflow` (String) Provisioning is handled by the service's builtin workflow integration.
- `custom_workflow` (Attributes) Provisioning is handled by custom workflows for provision + deprovision. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items--provisioning_method--custom_workflow))
- `linked_roles` (Attributes) Provisioning depends on prerequisite roles being provisioned first. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items--provisioning_method--linked_roles))
- `manual` (Attributes) Provisioning is handled manually by assigned users/groups. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items--provisioning_method--manual))

<a id="nestedatt--items--provisioning_method--custom_workflow"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items.provisioning_method.custom_workflow`

Read-Only:

- `deprovision_workflow_id` (String) The workflow ID to deprovision access.
- `provision_workflow_id` (String) The workflow ID to provision access.


<a id="nestedatt--items--provisioning_method--linked_roles"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items.provisioning_method.linked_roles`

Read-Only:

- `linked_role_ids` (List of String) The IDs of prerequisite roles.


<a id="nestedatt--items--provisioning_method--manual"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items.provisioning_method.manual`

Read-Only:

- `assignees` (Attributes List) Users and groups that should be assigned/notified for manual provisioning. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items--provisioning_method--manual--assignees))

<a id="nestedatt--items--provisioning_method--manual--assignees"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items.provisioning_method.manual.assignees`

Read-Only:

- `assignee_id` (String) The ID of the user or group.
- `assignee_type` (String) The type of assignee.
Available values: "MANUAL_PROVISIONING_ASSIGNEE_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED", "MANUAL_PROVISIONING_ASSIGNEE_TYPE_USER", "MANUAL_PROVISIONING_ASSIGNEE_TYPE_GROUP".
